description.value:
Halfling culture is warm and welcoming, placing value in hospitality and good neighborliness. Those who grew up among halflings often make good comrades and allies.

Friendly Folk. @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.races.RKCpoQOo6vXnORK4]{Friendly Folk} You are proficient in the Persuasion skill and with cook's tools.

Halfling Endurance. @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.races.CmRd0zVxJKxKCKPH]{Halfling Endurance} You are proficient in the Athletics skill.

Brave. @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.races.iQslcWHnjQ3HvC04]{Brave} You have advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

Languages. You can speak, read, and write Common and Halfling.

Foundry Note

You can drag your choices from the above onto your character sheet and it will automatically update.
